question.content:
A researcher took a random sample of professional soccer players from England and a separate random sample of professional soccer players from Nigeria to compare the heights of players from each country (in centimeters). The data from each sample is summarized in the box plots below.
  
**Which pieces of information can be gathered from these box plots?**  

[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/a4bb3c516b1f0792f946b45ad7bdc080e32caf05)

choices.content: The players from England tended to be taller on average.
The heights of the players from Nigeria varied noticeably more than those from England.
